title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.12 - Payout odds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5323.12 - Payout odds

State Regulations

The gaming facility shall post a sign at each table game
advising patrons of the payout odds for the game in effect at that table. The
gaming facility may change pay tables at its discretion at any time after the
conclusion of a round of play upon prior notice to the commission, so long as
the gaming facility complies with the minimum pay tables set forth in Part
5324. This section is not applicable if the payout odds are imprinted on the
table layout, as approved by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5323.12

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
